hero.title: Hi, I'm Nicolás
hero.description: I'm a developer based in Cali, Colombia with over two years of experience creating complete and modern applications in the digital realm. Check out my projects!

about.title: About
about.frontendDescription: I have experience developing in technologies such as Javascript, Typescript, React, Next and Angular.
about.uiDescription: I have designed multiple aplications considering the user experience to facilitate their subsequent development.
about.unityDescription: I have created dynamic and immersive environments combining visual elements and advanced functionalities.
